conbody.p: The Cloud Controller (CLC) is a Java-based AWS EC2-compatible interface to a Eucalyptus cloud that offers SOAP and "Query" interfaces, as well as a Web interface to the outside world. It handles all authentication, as well as high-level provisioning, resource scheduling, accounting, reporting, and quota management in the cloud. It also exposes an administrative interface for managing accounts, users, groups, access control, quotas, and vmtype settings.
The administrative interface is accessed at the URL https://<CLC_public_IP>:8443Â while other user-level services are accessed at the URL http://<CLC_public_IP>:8773.
Only one active Cloud Controller can be provisioned per cloud, but a second, passive Cloud Controller can be provisioned for high availability purposes.
